name: DegreeInvasionBowelWall
description: This is the code indicates the maximum degree of local invasion into or through the bowel wall.

concept.display: pT3: Tumor invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or into non-peritonealized pericolic or perirectal tissues (colon/rectum)
pT4a: Tumour directly invades other organs or structures (colon/rectum)

contains.display: pT3: Tumor invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or into non-peritonealized pericolic or perirectal tissues (colon/rectum)
